showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The locker rooms are kept clean, checked nightly, and provide a welcoming, private environment where lifeguards ensure the well-being of program participants. Some of the shower's don't work and that is something they will fix soon. ‚Ä¶
Great instructors, clean pool(the water is a bit cold though), amazing learning experience, there are locker rooms, shower rooms and separate dressing rooms. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ It was also incredibly chlorinated - to the point where I could feel the chlorine still on my skin after a shower. ‚Ä¶
